ai-patthana15.30:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.30:0.3_0: Telling in the world is profitable.
ai-patthana15.30:1.1_0: A skillful teaching doesn’t give rise to the world. The conditions are fulfilled. ...
ai-patthana15.30:1.1_2: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.30:2.1_0: A unskillful quality doesn’t give rise to yet.
ai-patthana15.30:3.1_0: When the world is independent, not falling apart. ...
